threat: A remote attacker could use this flaw to cause the Tomcat server to consume resources, resulting in a denial of service.
An attacker could use this issue with a crafted web application to bypass security-manager restrictions and read arbitrary files.
A remote attacker could use this flaw in configurations where Tomcat is behind a reverse proxy to perform HTTP request smuggling attacks.
